resources.string: Are you sure you would like to delete?
You must remember this phrase in order to be able to construct your password.
This introduction will take you through the steps needed to set up HashPass

When you press continue, you will be asked to enter a memorable phrase. This phrase must consist of 6 words. You will be asked to enter this phrase whenever you wish to view or generate a password, because this phrase is combined with a secret stored by the app to construct the password. 


YOU MUST REMEMBER THE PHRASE! 


If you forget the phrase, you can no longer construct your passwords, so please make sure you remember all 6 words.

HashPass Secure Input is like a keyboard, that\'s just for entering your username and password. This means that you don\'t need to use insecure copy and paste. Pressing Enable will take you to system settings, so that you can enable HashPass Secure Input as an input method.
That\'s all, you\'re ready to start using the app. If you have used the app before, and have exported passwords, you can import them using the import function, available from the main screen.
Activate Secure Input to securely enter your username and password without the need for copy and paste
Select the length of your generated password
Removing characters will prevent those characters from appearing in a generated password.
Once satisfied with the generated password, press to return to the add password screen
